attributes.action: A Choice for all Women to have there boobs and stomach done after birth by NHS
attributes.additional_details:
What I would like the Government to do is to consider the feelings, mental health and health of all mums, 
Childbirth is supposed to be an exciting experience! 
Not having the feelings of how horrible your boobs and Csection overhang looks all saggy which stays like that for the rest of your life causing low self esteem and depression
attributes.background:
I have had 2 kids I chose to be a parent but with being a parent I did not however chose to have saggy boobs and an overhand from a C-section that has made me feel so self conscious and not myself 

I am sure other mums not just me have felt the same way

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

The NHS and UK Government are not responsible for providing cosmetic surgery in most circumstances. You can find out when the NHS might pay for certain cosmetic surgery here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/cosmetic-procedures/cosmetic-procedures-on-the-nhs/
